Downtown Southside Outbound

Description:

The Downtown Southside Outbound leaves campus and travels through Vestal Pkwy to Conklin Avenue, & Tompkins Street in Southside Binghamton, and Henry & State Streets in Downtown Binghamton, while also making stops at Mirabito Stadium & the BC Junction Bus Terminal enroute to the University Downtown Center.

Operation Time:

Weekdays:
7:00 A.M. to 10:15 P.M.


Weekends:
10:00 A.M. to 6:45 P.M.

Notes:

Scroll below for a graphic map of the Downtown Southside Outbound, its schedule, and the stops along its route.

③ Tompkins St & Conklin Av

④ BC Junction

⑤ Arrives at the University Downtown Center
